PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06692024-06-10TC, FIN
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectHalifax Port Authority ** LETTERS PATENT ** **AMENDMENT**
PrecisOrder approving the supplementary LETTERS PATENT provisions increasing the aggregate limit on the power of the HALIFAX PORT AUTHORIRY to borrow money on its credit for port purposes from $75 million to $160 million.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the supplementary LETTERS PATENT provisions increasing the aggregate limit on the power of the HALIFAX PORT AUTHORIRY to borrow money on its credit for port purposes from $75 million to $160 million.
